name: credential_id
description: Unique identifier for the integration credential

name: provider
description: Integration provider: OPENAI, CLAUDE, DEEPSEEK, GCP_SA

name: credential_name
description: Human-readable name for this credential (e.g., 'Production OpenAI Key')

name: encrypted_credential
description: KMS-encrypted credential value (API key or JSON)

name: validation_status
description: Validation status: VALID, INVALID, PENDING, EXPIRED

name: last_error
description: Last validation error message if status is INVALID

name: metadata
description: Additional metadata (e.g., GCP project_id, region, scopes)

name: is_active
description: Whether this credential is currently active

name: created_by_user_id
description: User ID who created this credential

name: updated_by_user_id
description: User ID who last updated this credential
